cookie.name: pr-cookie-notice-status
cookie.description: Stores close status of cookie notice.

cookie.name: user_allowed_save_cookie
cookie.description: Stores built-in cookie consent per website.

cookie.name: guest-view
cookie.description: Stores the Order ID that guest shoppers use to retrieve their order status. Guest orders view. Used in “Orders and Returns” widgets.

cookie.name: login_redirect
cookie.description: Preserves the destination page the customer was loading before being directed to log in.

cookie.name: mage-messages
cookie.description: Tracks error messages and other notifications that are shown to the user, such as the cookie consent message, and various error messages. The message is deleted from the cookie after it is shown to the shopper.

cookie.name: section_data_ids
cookie.description: Stores customer-specific information related to shopper-initiated actions such as display wish list, checkout information, etc.

cookie.name: store
cookie.description: Tracks the specific store view / locale selected by the shopper.

cookie.name: amz_auth_err
cookie.description: Used if Enable Login with Amazon is enabled. Value 1 indicates an authorization error.

cookie.name: amz_auth_logout
cookie.description: Used if Enable Login with Amazon is enabled. Value 1 indicates that the user should be logged out.

cookie.name: mage-cache-sessid
cookie.description: The value of this cookie triggers the cleanup of local cache storage. When the cookie is removed by the backend application, the Admin cleans up local storage, and sets the cookie value to true.

cookie.name: mage-cache-storage
cookie.description: Local storage of visitor-specific content that enables ecommerce functions.

cookie.name: stf
cookie.description: Records the time messages are sent by the SendFriend (Email a Friend) module.

cookie.name: recently_viewed_product
cookie.description: Stores product IDs of recently viewed products for easy navigation.

cookie.name: recently_viewed_product_previous
cookie.description: Stores product IDs of recently previously viewed products for easy navigation.

cookie.name: mage-translation-storage
cookie.description: Stores translated content when requested by the shopper. Used when Translation Strategy is configured as "Dictionary (Translation on Storefront side)".

cookie.name: mage-translation-file-version
cookie.description: Tracks the version of translations in local storage. Used when Translation Strategy is configured as Dictionary (Translation on Storefront side).

cookie.name: product_data_storage
cookie.description: Stores configuration for product data related to Recently Viewed / Compared Products.

cookie.name: recently_compared_product
cookie.description: Stores product IDs of recently compared products.

cookie.name: recently_compared_product_previous
cookie.description: Stores product IDs of previously compared products for easy navigation.

cookie.name: mage-cache-storage-section-invalidation
cookie.description: Forces local storage of specific content sections that should be invalidated.

cookie.name: _ga
cookie.description: Used to distinguish users.

cookie.name: _gid
cookie.description: Used to distinguish users.

cookie.name: _gat
cookie.description: Used to throttle request rate.

cookie.name: _dc_gtm_*
cookie.description: Used to throttle request rate.
